item.title: CRIMINAL RICO: 18 U.S.C. §§1961-1968 A Manual For Federal Prosecutors
item.description: CRIMINAL RICO: 18 U.S.C. §§1961-1968 A Manual For Federal Prosecutors Click on this link to visualize the original document: CRIMINAL-RICO-A-Manual-For-Federal-Prosecutors.pdf I. OVERVIEW, RICO LEGISLATIVE HISTORY AND DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE APPROVAL PROCESS A. Overview of Criminal RICO […] An “enterprise” includes any individual, partnership, corporation, association, or other legal entity, and any group of individuals associated in fact although not a legal entity. For example, an arson ring can be a RICO enterprise, as can a small business or government agency.
